Description: Introduction to Unified Payments Interface for daily digital transactions.
More Info: UPI allows instant 24x7 money transfers using smartphones without needing to enter bank details repeatedly. It enables safe, fast, and free transactions for paying shops, bills, and friends directly from your bank account.

Description: How to use UPI securely without falling for scams.
More Info: Always keep your UPI PIN confidential, use official apps, verify the receiver's details before sending money, never approve payment requests from unknown persons, and immediately report suspicious activity to your bank.

Description: Understanding how to use net banking for daily transactions.
More Info: Net banking allows checking balances, transferring funds, and paying bills online using your bank's official website. Use strong passwords, change them regularly, and never log in on public Wi-Fi to keep your accounts secure.

Description: Why and how to build a financial safety cushion.
More Info: An emergency fund helps cover sudden expenses like medical emergencies or job loss. Save 3-6 months' worth of expenses in a separate account, start with small amounts, and build consistently to increase financial stability.

Description: Monitoring daily expenses using free apps.
More Info: Expense tracker apps help categorize your spending, visualize where your money goes, and manage budgets efficiently. Apps like Walnut and Goodbudget can help women track daily household expenses systematically.

Description: Recognizing and preventing online fraud and scams.
More Info: Phishing scams trick users into giving away sensitive information like passwords or OTPs through fake messages or emails. Always verify links, avoid sharing personal data with unknown contacts, and report suspicious messages immediately.

Description: Planning income and expenses effectively for financial health.
More Info: Creating a budget helps prioritize needs, control unnecessary spending, and save systematically for future goals. Track income and expenses using a notebook or apps and adjust spending to maintain savings discipline.

Description: Basics of credit scores and why they matter for loans.
More Info: Credit scores determine your loan eligibility and interest rates. Pay EMIs on time, avoid high credit usage, and check your credit report regularly to maintain a good score, which will help in future financial planning.

Description: Understanding health and life insurance for financial safety.
More Info: Insurance protects your family during emergencies. Women should consider health and life insurance to secure themselves and dependents. Choose policies after comparing premium costs, benefits, and claim processes.

Description: Learning to use Paytm, Google Pay, etc., securely for payments.
More Info: Download wallets only from official app stores, set up app locks, limit wallet balances, and check transaction notifications regularly to detect fraud. Always use wallets for small transactions and keep sensitive data secure.

More Info: Insurance protects your family during emergencies. Women should consider health and life insurance to secure themselves and dependents. Choose policies after comparing premium costs, benefits, and claim processes.

Description: Learning to use Paytm, Google Pay, etc., securely for payments.
More Info: Download wallets only from official app stores, set up app locks, limit wallet balances, and check transaction notifications regularly to detect fraud. Always use wallets for small transactions and keep sensitive data secure.

Description: Introduction to Unified Payments Interface for daily digital transactions.
More Info: UPI allows instant 24x7 money transfers using smartphones without needing to enter bank details repeatedly. It enables safe, fast, and free transactions for paying shops, bills, and friends directly from your bank account.

Description: How to use UPI securely without falling for scams.
More Info: Always keep your UPI PIN confidential, use official apps, verify the receiver's details before sending money, never approve payment requests from unknown persons, and immediately report suspicious activity to your bank.

Description: Understanding how to use net banking for daily transactions.
More Info: Net banking allows checking balances, transferring funds, and paying bills online using your bank's official website. Use strong passwords, change them regularly, and never log in on public Wi-Fi to keep your accounts secure.

Description: Why and how to build a financial safety cushion.
More Info: An emergency fund helps cover sudden expenses like medical emergencies or job loss. Save 3-6 months' worth of expenses in a separate account, start with small amounts, and build consistently to increase financial stability.

Description: Monitoring daily expenses using free apps.
More Info: Expense tracker apps help categorize your spending, visualize where your money goes, and manage budgets efficiently. Apps like Walnut and Goodbudget can help women track daily household expenses systematically.

Description: Recognizing and preventing online fraud and scams.
More Info: Phishing scams trick users into giving away sensitive information like passwords or OTPs through fake messages or emails. Always verify links, avoid sharing personal data with unknown contacts, and report suspicious messages immediately.

Description: Planning income and expenses effectively for financial health.
More Info: Creating a budget helps prioritize needs, control unnecessary spending, and save systematically for future goals. Track income and expenses using a notebook or apps and adjust spending to maintain savings discipline.

Description: Basics of credit scores and why they matter for loans.
More Info: Credit scores determine your loan eligibility and interest rates. Pay EMIs on time, avoid high credit usage, and check your credit report regularly to maintain a good score, which will help in future financial planning.

Description: Understanding health and life insurance for financial safety.
More Info: Insurance protects your family during emergencies. Women should consider health and life insurance to secure themselves and dependents. Choose policies after comparing premium costs, benefits, and claim processes.

Description: Learning to use Paytm, Google Pay, etc., securely for payments.
More Info: Download wallets only from official app stores, set up app locks, limit wallet balances, and check transaction notifications regularly to detect fraud. Always use wallets for small transactions and keep sensitive data secure.
